HBV202G - Final Assignment

Mikael Andri Ingason - mai24@hi.is

The project

Library system, continued from assignment 8. In this assignment we use everything the weekly assignments covered (Maven, JUnit, Git, UML design, refactoring, JAR and documentation).

Building and running (with no jar)

Maven:

  • mvn compile compiles all implementation classes.
  • mvn test runs all test cases.
  • mvn exec:java executes the main method (Library).
